alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:52AM EDT until April 10 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flood stage. Water reaches New Milford Foundry and Youngfield Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...It will rise above flood stage this morning to 8.1 feet. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 12/19/2000. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 5 am: 7.6 Forecast: Fri 8 am 8.0 Fri 2 pm 8.0 Fri 8 pm 7.6 Sat 2 am 7.8 Sat 8 am 8.0 Sat 2 pm 8.1 Sat 8 pm 8.1 Sun 2 am 8.0 Sun 8 am 7.9 Sun 2 pm 7.8 Sun 8 pm 7.6 Mon 2 am 7.4 &&
